MagicalItems.Name: Armblade
MagicalItems.Description: An armblade is a unique weapon that can be attached to a character's forearm. It requires attunement and grants the wielder the ability to make melee attacks with it.

MagicalItems.Name: Armor of Gleaming
MagicalItems.Description: This armor always appears clean and shiny, requiring no maintenance to keep its pristine appearance. It does not provide any additional protective properties.

MagicalItems.Name: Bead of Nourishment
MagicalItems.Description: This small bead can be swallowed as an action, providing nourishment equivalent to a day's worth of food.

MagicalItems.Name: Bead of Refreshment
MagicalItems.Description: This small bead can be swallowed as an action, providing refreshment equivalent to a day's worth of water.

MagicalItems.Name: Boots of False Tracks
MagicalItems.Description: While wearing these boots, you can choose to leave tracks that mislead pursuers, making it difficult to follow your true trail.

MagicalItems.Name: Bottle of Boundless Coffee
MagicalItems.Description: This magical bottle produces an endless supply of hot, aromatic coffee. It can fill a small cup each time it is uncorked.

MagicalItems.Name: Breathing Bubble
MagicalItems.Description: When activated, this bubble allows its wearer to breathe underwater or in other hostile environments for up to 1 hour.

MagicalItems.Name: Candle of the Deep
MagicalItems.Description: This enchanted candle burns brightly even underwater or in other submerged conditions.

MagicalItems.Name: Cast-Off Armor
MagicalItems.Description: This armor can be removed with a single command word, allowing the wearer to doff it quickly.

MagicalItems.Name: Charlatan's Die
MagicalItems.Description: This six-sided die can be rolled to determine the outcome of deceptions. When attuned, you can influence the result of the roll.

MagicalItems.Name: Cleansing Stone
MagicalItems.Description: This stone can purify food and water, removing toxins and contaminants.

MagicalItems.Name: Cloak of Billowing
MagicalItems.Description: This cloak billows dramatically even in the absence of wind, providing no functional advantage.

MagicalItems.Name: Cloak of Many Fashions
MagicalItems.Description: This cloak can change its appearance at will, allowing the wearer to alter its color and style.

MagicalItems.Name: Clockwork Amulet
MagicalItems.Description: This amulet contains a tiny clockwork device that can produce a ticking sound when activated.

MagicalItems.Name: Clothes of Mending
MagicalItems.Description: These magical clothes automatically repair themselves, removing minor damage and stains.

MagicalItems.Name: Coin of Delving
MagicalItems.Description: This enchanted coin reveals the presence of hidden or concealed compartments in objects or structures.

MagicalItems.Name: Cuddly Strixhaven Mascot
MagicalItems.Description: This plush mascot from Strixhaven University is irresistibly cuddly and comforting.

MagicalItems.Name: Dark Shard Amulet
MagicalItems.Description: This amulet is made from a dark shard and grants the wearer darkvision when attuned.

MagicalItems.Name: Dread Helm
MagicalItems.Description: This menacing helmet can produce a haunting whispering sound when worn.

MagicalItems.Name: Ear Horn of Hearing
MagicalItems.Description: When used, this horn increases the user's hearing range, allowing them to detect faint sounds more easily.

MagicalItems.Name: Earring of Message
MagicalItems.Description: Two creatures each wearing one of these earrings can communicate telepathically with each other over a limited distance.

MagicalItems.Name: Enduring Spellbook
MagicalItems.Description: This spellbook is immune to fire, water, and other environmental hazards.

MagicalItems.Name: Ersatz Eye
MagicalItems.Description: When attuned, this false eye provides vision and can be used to see through illusions.

MagicalItems.Name: Everbright Lantern
MagicalItems.Description: This lantern produces a bright, steady light that is not affected by wind or other conditions.

MagicalItems.Name: Feather Token
MagicalItems.Description: This token can transform into a feather when activated.

MagicalItems.Name: Glamerweave
MagicalItems.Description: This clothing can change its appearance to resemble any other set of clothing.

MagicalItems.Name: Hat of Vermin
MagicalItems.Description: This hat can produce harmless vermin like insects and rodents, which crawl out from under it.

MagicalItems.Name: Hat of Wizardry
MagicalItems.Description: This hat grants the wearer the ability to cast one cantrip while attuned.

MagicalItems.Name: Heward's Handy Spice Pouch
MagicalItems.Description: This magical pouch always contains a wide variety of fresh spices, enhancing the flavor of meals.

MagicalItems.Name: Horn of Silent Alarm
MagicalItems.Description: When blown, this horn emits a sound that can alert others silently.

MagicalItems.Name: Illuminator's Tattoo
MagicalItems.Description: This tattoo can be attuned to and used to cast the light spell at will.

MagicalItems.Name: Imbued Wood Focus
MagicalItems.Description: This focus is carved from special wood and grants a bonus to spell attacks when used by spellcasters.

MagicalItems.Name: Instrument of Illusions
MagicalItems.Description: This musical instrument allows the attuned user to create minor visual illusions when played.

MagicalItems.Name: Instrument of Scribing
MagicalItems.Description: This musical instrument allows the attuned user to transcribe spells into a spellbook.

MagicalItems.Name: Keycharm
MagicalItems.Description: This charm can be attuned to and used to open locks more easily.

MagicalItems.Name: Lantern of Tracking
MagicalItems.Description: This lantern can reveal faint tracks or signs of passage when its light is focused on the ground.

MagicalItems.Name: Lock of Trickery
MagicalItems.Description: This lock can be difficult to pick and may mislead thieves.

MagicalItems.Name: Masque Charm
MagicalItems.Description: This charm grants the wearer a beautiful, featureless mask that can be used to disguise their face.

MagicalItems.Name: Masquerade Tattoo
MagicalItems.Description: This magical tattoo grants the wearer the ability to cast disguise self while attuned.

MagicalItems.Name: Medal of Muscle
MagicalItems.Description: Wearing this medal grants advantage on Strength checks.

MagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Conch
MagicalItems.Description: This medal allows the wearer to breathe underwater and communicate with aquatic creatures.

MagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Horizonback
MagicalItems.Description: This medal enhances the wearer's land speed and grants the ability to cast longstrider once per day.

MagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Maze
MagicalItems.Description: This medal provides guidance in labyrinthine environments and allows the wearer to cast find the path once per day.

MagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Meat Pie
MagicalItems.Description: This medal grants advantage on Charisma checks when negotiating for food or hospitality.

MagicalItems.Name: Medal of the Wetlands
MagicalItems.Description: This medal allows the wearer to traverse marshy terrain with ease and grants the ability to cast water walk once per day.

MagicalItems.Name: Medal of Wit
MagicalItems.Description: This medal grants advantage on Intelligence checks.

MagicalItems.Name: Moodmark Paint
MagicalItems.Description: This paint can be applied to change the color of objects or creatures, affecting their mood and demeanor.

MagicalItems.Name: Moon-Touched Sword
MagicalItems.Description: This sword emits a dim light in a 15-foot radius, similar to moonlight, when drawn.

MagicalItems.Name: Mystery Key
MagicalItems.Description: This key can open a mysterious lock, but the nature of the lock and what lies behind it is unknown.

MagicalItems.Name: Orb of Direction
MagicalItems.Description: This crystal orb can reveal the cardinal directions and help the user navigate.

MagicalItems.Name: Orb of Time
MagicalItems.Description: This glass orb can provide an estimate of the current time and date.

MagicalItems.Name: Perfume of Bewitching
MagicalItems.Description: This perfume can be used to enhance the user's Charisma-based checks when interacting with others.

MagicalItems.Name: Pipe of Remembrance
MagicalItems.Description: When smoked, this pipe can evoke pleasant memories and grant the user advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks.

MagicalItems.Name: Pipe of Smoke Monsters
MagicalItems.Description: This pipe can create illusions of smoke monsters when smoked.

MagicalItems.Name: Pole of Angling
MagicalItems.Description: This telescoping pole can be used for fishing and extends up to 10 feet in length.

MagicalItems.Name: Pole of Collapsing
MagicalItems.Description: This pole can be collapsed into a tiny form, making it easy to carry and conceal.

MagicalItems.Name: Pot of Awakening
MagicalItems.Description: This magical pot can awaken plants placed inside it.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Climbing
MagicalItems.Description: When consumed, this potion grants the ability to climb surfaces for an hour without making checks.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Healing
MagicalItems.Description: This common potion can be consumed to restore a small amount of hit points.

MagicalItems.Name: Pressure Capsule
MagicalItems.Description: This capsule can withstand extreme pressure and provides air to the user when submerged.

MagicalItems.Name: Prosthetic Limb
MagicalItems.Description: This prosthetic limb can be attached to replace a missing limb, granting mobility and functionality.

MagicalItems.Name: Rope of Mending
MagicalItems.Description: This magical rope can mend itself when damaged, restoring its integrity.

MagicalItems.Name: Sekolahian Worshipping Statuette
MagicalItems.Description: This statuette represents the worship of Sekolah, the Sea Mother.

MagicalItems.Name: Shiftweave
MagicalItems.Description: This magical clothing can change its appearance and style to match the wearer's desires.

MagicalItems.Name: Spell Scroll
MagicalItems.Description: This scroll contains a single spell that can be cast when read.

MagicalItems.Name: Spellshard
MagicalItems.Description: This shard can store a spell and be used to cast it later.

MagicalItems.Name: Spellwrought Tattoo
MagicalItems.Description: This magical tattoo grants the wearer the ability to cast a specific spell once per day.

MagicalItems.Name: Staff of Adornment
MagicalItems.Description: This staff can create simple decorative effects, such as flower blossoms or falling leaves.

MagicalItems.Name: Staff of Birdcalls
MagicalItems.Description: This staff can mimic the sounds of various birds, allowing the user to communicate or create distractions.

MagicalItems.Name: Staff of Flowers
MagicalItems.Description: This staff can create flowers and floral arrangements when used.

MagicalItems.Name: Strixhaven Pennant
MagicalItems.Description: This pennant displays the colors and emblem of Strixhaven University.

MagicalItems.Name: Tankard of Sobriety
MagicalItems.Description: This tankard prevents its user from becoming intoxicated while drinking from it.

MagicalItems.Name: Thermal Cube
MagicalItems.Description: This cube can maintain a consistent temperature, keeping its contents hot or cold as desired.

MagicalItems.Name: Unbreakable Arrow
MagicalItems.Description: This arrow is unbreakable and can be reused indefinitely.

MagicalItems.Name: Veteran's Cane
MagicalItems.Description: This cane signifies a veteran's status and grants advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks when dealing with veterans.

MagicalItems.Name: Vox Seeker
MagicalItems.Description: This small device allows the user to send and receive messages over great distances, using vocal messages.

MagicalItems.Name: Walloping Ammunition
MagicalItems.Description: This ammunition deals additional bludgeoning damage when it hits a target.

MagicalItems.Name: Wand of Conducting
MagicalItems.Description: This wand can produce musical notes when waved, allowing the user to conduct music.

MagicalItems.Name: Wand of Pyrotechnics
MagicalItems.Description: This wand can produce dazzling fireworks when used.

MagicalItems.Name: Wand of Scowls
MagicalItems.Description: This wand can make the user appear more intimidating when scowling.

MagicalItems.Name: Wand of Smiles
MagicalItems.Description: This wand can make the user appear more friendly and approachable when smiling.

MagicalItems.Name: Adamantine Armor
MagicalItems.Description: This suit of armor is reinforced with adamantine, granting it exceptional durability and resistance to damage.

MagicalItems.Name: Alchemy Jug
MagicalItems.Description: This magical jug can produce various substances, including fresh water, beer, mayonnaise, and more.

MagicalItems.Name: All-Purpose Tool
MagicalItems.Description: This versatile tool can transform into various forms, such as a crowbar, a shovel, or a pickaxe, based on the wielder's needs.

MagicalItems.Name: Ammunition, +1, +2, or +3
MagicalItems.Description: These magical projectiles grant a bonus to attack and damage rolls when used as ammunition for ranged weapons.

MagicalItems.Name: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
MagicalItems.Description: While wearing this amulet, you cannot be targeted by divination spells and cannot be detected through magical means.

MagicalItems.Name: Amulet of the Devout
MagicalItems.Description: This amulet grants its wearer bonuses to spell saves and can restore spell slots when prayers are offered.

MagicalItems.Name: Amulet of the Drunkard
MagicalItems.Description: This amulet absorbs the effects of alcohol, allowing the wearer to drink heavily without becoming intoxicated.

MagicalItems.Name: Arcane Grimoire
MagicalItems.Description: This enchanted book provides additional spellcasting abilities to those who attune to it.

MagicalItems.Name: Bag of Holding
MagicalItems.Description: This magical bag has an extradimensional interior, providing ample storage space for items.

MagicalItems.Name: Bag of Tricks
MagicalItems.Description: This bag can produce various small animals on command, which can be used to aid the owner.

MagicalItems.Name: Balance of Harmony
MagicalItems.Description: This balance beam provides advantage on Acrobatics and Athletics checks for maintaining balance.

MagicalItems.Name: Balloon Pack
MagicalItems.Description: This backpack can inflate into a balloon, allowing the wearer to float for short periods.

MagicalItems.Name: Barrier Tattoo
MagicalItems.Description: This magical tattoo creates protective barriers that can absorb damage for the wearer.

MagicalItems.Name: Blood Spear
MagicalItems.Description: This weapon is bound to the wielder's blood, granting bonuses to attack and damage rolls.

MagicalItems.Name: Bloodwell Vial
MagicalItems.Description: This vial can store the blood of creatures and be used for various purposes, including healing and spellcasting.

MagicalItems.Name: Boots of Elvenkind
MagicalItems.Description: These boots grant advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and make the wearer's footsteps nearly silent.

MagicalItems.Name: Boots of Striding and Springing
MagicalItems.Description: These boots enhance the wearer's mobility, allowing for increased speed and jumping capabilities.

MagicalItems.Name: Boots of the Winterlands
MagicalItems.Description: These boots provide resistance to cold damage and allow the wearer to move across icy terrain with ease.

MagicalItems.Name: Bottled Breath
MagicalItems.Description: This potion allows the drinker to breathe underwater for a limited time.

MagicalItems.Name: Bracers of Archery
MagicalItems.Description: These bracers grant bonuses to attack rolls with ranged weapons and increase the range of ranged attacks.

MagicalItems.Name: Brooch of Living Essence
MagicalItems.Description: This brooch can store the essence of slain creatures and release it to heal the wearer.

MagicalItems.Name: Brooch of Shielding
MagicalItems.Description: This brooch provides protection against magic missile spells and other forms of magical attacks.

MagicalItems.Name: Broom of Flying
MagicalItems.Description: This enchanted broomstick allows the user to fly through the air at a controlled speed.

MagicalItems.Name: Cap of Water Breathing
MagicalItems.Description: This cap allows the wearer to breathe underwater as if they were on land.

MagicalItems.Name: Circlet of Blasting
MagicalItems.Description: This circlet can release powerful blasts of energy, dealing damage to targets.

MagicalItems.Name: Cloak of Elvenkind
MagicalItems.Description: This cloak grants advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks and makes the wearer blend into natural surroundings.

MagicalItems.Name: Cloak of Protection
MagicalItems.Description: This cloak grants a bonus to AC and saving throws while worn.

MagicalItems.Name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
MagicalItems.Description: This cloak allows the wearer to breathe underwater and swim with great speed.

MagicalItems.Name: Coiling Grasp Tattoo
MagicalItems.Description: This magical tattoo enhances the wearer's ability to grapple and restrain foes.

MagicalItems.Name: Cracked Driftglobe
MagicalItems.Description: This partially damaged driftglobe can emit light and levitate, but has limited functionality.

MagicalItems.Name: Cursed Luckstone
MagicalItems.Description: This luckstone carries a curse that grants both good and bad luck to the bearer.

MagicalItems.Name: Decanter of Endless Water
MagicalItems.Description: This decanter can produce an endless stream of water, making it useful for various purposes.

MagicalItems.Name: Deck of Illusions
MagicalItems.Description: This deck of cards can create illusory images and creatures when cards are drawn.

MagicalItems.Name: Dragon Vessel
MagicalItems.Description: This vessel can store and release a dragon's breath weapon, allowing the user to unleash devastating attacks.

MagicalItems.Name: Dragonhide Belt
MagicalItems.Description: This belt is made from dragon scales and provides resistance to a specific type of damage.

MagicalItems.Name: Dragon's Wrath Weapon
MagicalItems.Description: This weapon is imbued with the fury of dragons, dealing additional damage and effects against dragon-type creatures.

MagicalItems.Name: Dragon-Touched Focus
MagicalItems.Description: This focus is crafted from dragon parts and enhances the user's spellcasting abilities.

MagicalItems.Name: Driftglobe
MagicalItems.Description: This magical globe emits light and can levitate, serving as a versatile source of illumination.

MagicalItems.Name: Dust of Corrosion
MagicalItems.Description: This powder corrodes metal objects upon contact, causing them to degrade or break.

MagicalItems.Name: Dust of Deliciousness
MagicalItems.Description: This dust can be sprinkled on food to enhance its flavor and nutrition.

MagicalItems.Name: Dust of Disappearance
MagicalItems.Description: This fine powder can turn the user invisible for a limited duration when thrown into the air.

MagicalItems.Name: Dust of Dryness
MagicalItems.Description: This dust can absorb large quantities of water, turning it into a small pellet for later use.

MagicalItems.Name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
MagicalItems.Description: This dust, when released, can cause creatures to suffer from sneezing fits or choking, potentially incapacitating them.

MagicalItems.Name: Earworm
MagicalItems.Description: This magical earworm provides its user with knowledge of a specific topic or skill.

MagicalItems.Name: Eldritch Claw Tattoo
MagicalItems.Description: This tattoo enhances the user's unarmed strikes, granting additional damage and effects.

MagicalItems.Name: Elemental Gem
MagicalItems.Description: This gem can summon an elemental creature to aid the user, based on the gem's type.

MagicalItems.Name: Emerald Pen
MagicalItems.Description: This enchanted pen can write messages in an unknown script that can only be read with another emerald pen.

MagicalItems.Name: Eversmoking Bottle
MagicalItems.Description: This bottle continually emits thick smoke, obscuring vision and providing concealment.

MagicalItems.Name: Eyes of Charming
MagicalItems.Description: These lenses allow the wearer to cast charm spells more effectively and influence others with their gaze.

MagicalItems.Name: Eyes of Minute Seeing
MagicalItems.Description: These lenses allow the wearer to see fine details, revealing hidden messages or small objects.

MagicalItems.Name: Eyes of the Eagle
MagicalItems.Description: These lenses enhance the wearer's vision, granting advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MagicalItems.Name: Feywild Shard
MagicalItems.Description: This shard connects the user to the Feywild, allowing them to cast a unique spell once per day.

MagicalItems.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power
MagicalItems.Description: This figurine can transform into a creature when activated, serving as a loyal companion.

MagicalItems.Name: Finder's Goggles
MagicalItems.Description: These goggles grant the wearer enhanced tracking abilities and the ability to locate objects.

MagicalItems.Name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
MagicalItems.Description: These gauntlets set the wearer's Strength score to 19, granting them enhanced physical strength.

MagicalItems.Name: Gem of Brightness
MagicalItems.Description: This gem can emit bright light to blind creatures and reveal hidden objects in the dark.

MagicalItems.Name: Glamerweave
MagicalItems.Description: This enchanted fabric can change its appearance to resemble different types of clothing or armor.

MagicalItems.Name: Gloves of Missile Snaring
MagicalItems.Description: These gloves allow the wearer to catch and deflect incoming projectiles, reducing damage from ranged attacks.

MagicalItems.Name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
MagicalItems.Description: These gloves grant the wearer enhanced swimming and climbing abilities.

MagicalItems.Name: Gloves of Thievery
MagicalItems.Description: These gloves provide a bonus to Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) and Dexterity (Lockpicking) checks.

MagicalItems.Name: Goggles of Night
MagicalItems.Description: These goggles grant the wearer darkvision, allowing them to see in complete darkness.

MagicalItems.Name: Goggles of Object Reading
MagicalItems.Description: These goggles allow the wearer to discern the history and magical properties of objects by examining them.

MagicalItems.Name: Guardian Emblem
MagicalItems.Description: This emblem summons a guardian spirit to protect the bearer and their allies.

MagicalItems.Name: Guild Keyrune
MagicalItems.Description: This key-like emblem represents membership in a specific guild and grants benefits within the guild.

MagicalItems.Name: Guild Signet Ring
MagicalItems.Description: This signet ring bears the emblem of a particular guild and can be used to seal documents and show guild membership.

MagicalItems.Name: Harkon's Bite
MagicalItems.Description: This magical trinket can heal the user and harm undead creatures when bitten.

MagicalItems.Name: Hat of Disguise
MagicalItems.Description: This hat allows the wearer to change their appearance at will, assuming different forms.

MagicalItems.Name: Headband of Intellect
MagicalItems.Description: This headband sets the wearer's Intelligence score to 19, granting them enhanced mental abilities.

MagicalItems.Name: Hellfire Weapon
MagicalItems.Description: This weapon is imbued with hellfire, dealing additional fire damage and causing creatures to ignite when struck.

MagicalItems.Name: Helm of Comprehending Languages
MagicalItems.Description: This helm allows the wearer to understand and speak any language they hear.

MagicalItems.Name: Helm of Telepathy
MagicalItems.Description: This helm allows the wearer to communicate telepathically with others and read their surface thoughts.

MagicalItems.Name: Helm of Underwater Action
MagicalItems.Description: This helm grants the wearer the ability to breathe underwater and move freely in aquatic environments.

MagicalItems.Name: Immovable Rod
MagicalItems.Description: This rod can become magically fixed in place, holding significant weight and preventing movement.

MagicalItems.Name: Infernal Puzzle Box
MagicalItems.Description: This intricate puzzle box may contain secrets, spells, or dangerous entities from the infernal planes.

MagicalItems.Name: Insignia of Claws
MagicalItems.Description: This emblem provides a natural weapon, such as claws, to the wearer, which can be used for unarmed strikes.

MagicalItems.Name: Instrument of the Bards
MagicalItems.Description: This magical instrument enhances the user's musical abilities and can cast spells when played.

MagicalItems.Name: Javelin of Lightning
MagicalItems.Description: This javelin can be thrown to create a bolt of lightning that damages creatures in its path.

MagicalItems.Name: Keoghtom's Ointment
MagicalItems.Description: This ointment can be used to heal wounds, neutralize poisons, and provide various protective effects.

MagicalItems.Name: Lantern of Revealing
MagicalItems.Description: This lantern reveals hidden and invisible creatures and objects within its light.

MagicalItems.Name: Living Gloves
MagicalItems.Description: These gloves are made from living material and can heal the wearer's wounds over time.

MagicalItems.Name: Lorehold Primer
MagicalItems.Description: This primer contains knowledge of history and can grant expertise in certain subjects.

MagicalItems.Name: Mariner's Armor
MagicalItems.Description: This armor is designed for underwater use, providing the wearer with a swim speed and the ability to breathe underwater.

MagicalItems.Name: Mask of the Beast
MagicalItems.Description: This mask allows the wearer to assume the form of a specific animal and gain its abilities.

MagicalItems.Name: Medallion of Thoughts
MagicalItems.Description: This medallion grants the wearer the ability to detect surface thoughts and communicate telepathically.

MagicalItems.Name: Mind Carapace Armor
MagicalItems.Description: This armor is crafted from the carapace of an aberrant creature, granting resistance to psychic damage.

MagicalItems.Name: Mithral Armor
MagicalItems.Description: This lightweight yet durable armor is made from mithral, offering both protection and mobility.

MagicalItems.Name: Mizzium Apparatus
MagicalItems.Description: This device allows the user to cast spells from scrolls without consuming the scroll.

MagicalItems.Name: Moon Sickle
MagicalItems.Description: This weapon is imbued with the power of the moon, dealing extra damage and granting the ability to cast spells.

MagicalItems.Name: Mummy Rot Antidote
MagicalItems.Description: This potion can cure the debilitating effects of mummy rot, a curse inflicted by mummies.

MagicalItems.Name: Nature's Mantle
MagicalItems.Description: This mantle provides resistance to cold, fire, and lightning damage, and can summon a protective barrier.

MagicalItems.Name: Necklace of Adaptation
MagicalItems.Description: This necklace allows the wearer to breathe normally in any environment and resist harmful gases.

MagicalItems.Name: Night Caller
MagicalItems.Description: This magical instrument can produce hauntingly beautiful music that influences dreams and sleep.

MagicalItems.Name: Oil of Slipperiness
MagicalItems.Description: This oil makes the user extremely slippery and difficult to grapple or restrain.

MagicalItems.Name: Paper Bird
MagicalItems.Description: This paper bird can carry written messages to a specified recipient, returning afterward.

MagicalItems.Name: Pearl of Power
MagicalItems.Description: This pearl allows the attuned user to regain expended spell slots once per day.

MagicalItems.Name: Periapt of Health
MagicalItems.Description: This amulet grants immunity to disease and prevents the wearer from becoming poisoned.

MagicalItems.Name: Periapt of Wound Closure
MagicalItems.Description: This amulet accelerates the wearer's natural healing abilities, stabilizing them when unconscious.

MagicalItems.Name: Philter of Love
MagicalItems.Description: This potion can make a creature fall deeply in love with the person who administers it.

MagicalItems.Name: Pipes of Haunting
MagicalItems.Description: These pipes can create eerie music that frightens and disturbs those who hear it.

MagicalItems.Name: Pipes of the Sewers
MagicalItems.Description: These pipes can summon a swarm of rats or control existing vermin in the area.

MagicalItems.Name: Piwafwi
MagicalItems.Description: This magical cloak can create a protective field and conceal the wearer in shadows.

MagicalItems.Name: Pixie Dust
MagicalItems.Description: This shimmering dust allows the user to cast the fly spell for a limited duration.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Advantage
MagicalItems.Description: This potion grants advantage on the next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw made by the drinker.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Animal Friendship
MagicalItems.Description: This potion can be used to befriend and charm animals for a limited duration.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Fire Breath
MagicalItems.Description: This potion allows the drinker to exhale a cone of fire, damaging creatures in its path.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Giant Strength
MagicalItems.Description: This potion temporarily increases the drinker's Strength score to a very high level.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Growth
MagicalItems.Description: This potion causes the drinker to grow in size, increasing their strength and reach.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Healing
MagicalItems.Description: This potion can be consumed to restore a moderate amount of hit points to the user.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Poison
MagicalItems.Description: This potion is highly toxic and can be used to poison weapons or create deadly traps.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Resistance
MagicalItems.Description: This potion grants resistance to a specific type of damage for a limited duration.

MagicalItems.Name: Potion of Water Breathing
MagicalItems.Description: This potion allows the drinker to breathe underwater for a limited time.

MagicalItems.Name: Prismari Primer
MagicalItems.Description: This primer contains knowledge of elemental magic and can enhance the user's spells.

MagicalItems.Name: Psi Crystal
MagicalItems.Description: This crystal can enhance the user's psionic abilities and grant them psionic focus.

MagicalItems.Name: Pyroconverger
MagicalItems.Description: This device can project a cone of flames, dealing fire damage to creatures in its path.

MagicalItems.Name: Quandrix Primer
MagicalItems.Description: This primer contains knowledge of mathematical magic and can enhance the user's spells.

MagicalItems.Name: Quiver of Ehlonna
MagicalItems.Description: This quiver can hold an endless supply of arrows or bolts and retrieve any ammunition used.

MagicalItems.Name: Rhythm Maker's Drum
MagicalItems.Description: This magical drum can produce rhythms that enhance the abilities of those who listen to it.

MagicalItems.Name: Ring of Jumping
MagicalItems.Description: This ring grants the wearer incredible jumping ability, allowing them to leap great distances.

MagicalItems.Name: Ring of Mind Shielding
MagicalItems.Description: This ring protects the wearer's mind from intrusion and allows them to hide their alignment.

MagicalItems.Name: Ring of Obscuring
MagicalItems.Description: This ring can create a magical veil of darkness, obscuring the wearer's location and making them difficult to detect.

MagicalItems.Name: Ring of Truth Telling
MagicalItems.Description: This ring compels the wearer to speak the truth and grants the ability to discern lies.

MagicalItems.Name: Ring of Warmth
MagicalItems.Description: This ring protects the wearer from extreme cold and grants resistance to cold damage.

MagicalItems.Name: Rings of Shared Suffering

MagicalItems.Name: Robe of Serpents
MagicalItems.Description: This robe is adorned with serpentine motifs and can summon snakes to aid the wearer.

MagicalItems.Name: Robe of Useful Items
MagicalItems.Description: This robe is covered in patches that can be torn off and activated to produce various useful items.

MagicalItems.Name: Rod of Retribution
